intent_atoms.description: Replace external Bento4 test fixtures with internal MP4 sample files to eliminate dependency and gain control over test data.
All CLI compatibility tests must pass using the new internal MP4 samples.
The DOCS/SAMPLES/Bento4-master directory must be removed from the repository.
Test references should point only to internal sample files and not to any external Bento4 paths.

functional_units.name: Create Minimal MP4 Sample Files
functional_units.description: Generate small MP4 files for testing purposes

functional_units.name: Update Test References
functional_units.description: Modify test code to point to new sample file locations

functional_units.name: Verify CLI Compatibility Tests
functional_units.description: Run and confirm that all command-line interface tests pass using the new fixtures

functional_units.name: Remove External Bento4 Samples Directory
functional_units.description: Delete the DOCS/SAMPLES/Bento4-master directory from the project
